data.title: B Bus Berkshire Regional Transit Authority
data.meta_description: Berkshire Regional Transit Authority operates the B Bus public transportation in the Berkshires.
data.text:
BRTA Pittsfield MA

Commonly known in the Berkshires as the B Bus, the Berkshire Regional Transit Authority provides public transportation service in Berkshire county. BRTA is located in the Joseph Scelsi Intermodal Transportation Center at 1 Columbus Ave., in downtown Pittsfield. Follow the link to get complete information on getting around the Berkshires including the brta schedule pittsfield ma. Hours of operation are: Monday – Friday, 5:45 AM – 7:20 PM; Saturday, 7:15 AM – 7:00 PM; Sunday, No Service. There is no BRTA bus service on the following days:
